title: Define data sets on the fly
sql:
select * from ( 
  values ( 1, 'Champions United', 1 ), 
         ( 2, 'Runner-up City', 2 ), 
         ( 3, 'Relegated Athletic', 3 ), 
         ( 4, 'Underdogs United', 4 ), 
         ( 5, 'Midtable Town', 5 ), 
         ( 6, 'Upstart FC', 6 ) 
) t ( team_id, team_name, home_stadium );

   TEAM_ID TEAM_NAME          HOME_STADIUM
---------- ------------------ ------------
         1 Champions United              1
         2 Runner-up City                2
         3 Relegated Athletic            3
         4 Underdogs United              4
         5 Midtable Town                 5
         6 Upstart FC                    6

explanations.text: This provides the table alias an column names for the data set
In the VALUES clause list the values for each column & row
